forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. High 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times early. High 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
